About.title: about lordksix
About.subtitle: Full Stack software developer
About.descrip1: I am a full stack developer with experience with TypeScript, NextJS, NestJS, Ruby, Python, Django, PHP, and more.
About.descrip1_1: I have a great passion for creating end-to-end, scalable, and efficient applications that provide an optimal user experience and mentoring junior developers.
About.descrip1_2: I take great pride when I see a project's final product work as intended or whenever a team member or junior developer has overcome obstacles or blockers.
About.fun_fact: In my free time, I love to read historic novels, run, check, and improve old code, design new machines, and meet new people.
About.descrip2: If you like what you see and have a project you need coded, don't hesitate to contact me.

Contact.title: contact me
Contact.description: If you have an application you are interested in developing, a feature that you need built or a project that needs coding, contact me. I'd love to help with it!
